title: RaySensor not working properly in Bullet

content.raw:
One issue: all measurements are taken relative to the origin of the world. Test by opening sdf/worlds/empty_bullet.world and inserting a hokuyo sensor. If the hokuyo is inserted with a positive x position, it will see itself.

Another issue: gazebo will segfault if you insert another object into the scene. Here's a backtrace:
~~~

content.html:
One issue: all measurements are taken relative to the origin of the world. Test by opening sdf/worlds/empty_bullet.world and inserting a hokuyo sensor. If the hokuyo is inserted with a positive x position, it will see itself.

Another issue: gazebo will segfault if you insert another object into the scene. Here's a backtrace:
